channel.title: Dupers :confused:
channel.description:
Hey people, Well i learned about 4 people on my server were duping, i got everything straightned out, but i dont know how to fix the dupeing problem, its the most common/basic one were your on second trade screen and other player accepts and you quickly hit accept and decline really fast... any one know how to fix?
thanks, Lemons Burn

item.title: Dupers :confused:
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Know the duping method first. Then you can ‘add’ traps whenever a person uses that method.

Read full topic

item.title: Dupers :confused:
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

[quote=“moparclient, post:4, topic:326748”]do some checking like

if(tradeaccepted && tradedeclined){
sM(“dupe found”);
}

thats my shot[/quote]

I lol’d at this.

Read full topic

item.title: Dupers :confused:
item.dc:creator: @lemons_burn lemons burn
item.description:
@lemons_burn wrote:

client.java:170: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable tradeaccepted
location: class client
if(tradeaccepted && tradedeclined){
^
client.java:170: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable tradedeclined
location: class client
if(tradeaccepted && tradedeclined){
^
Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Finished Now Leave Me The Fuck Alone!
Press any key to continue . . .

i get that error

Read full topic

item.title: Dupers :confused:
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“moparclient, post:4, topic:326748”]do some checking like

if(tradeaccepted && tradedeclined){
sM(“dupe found”);
}

thats my shot[/quote]
What is sending the person a message going to do?
You’re going to have to make it send it to a file saying [PLAYERNAME+PLAYERNAME] May be trying to dupe, and you can check their account. Or you can just search for an Anti-Dupe. I had added it to mine, but I don’t remember how I did it =/ Sorry. It is a simple tut, I remember that much.

Read full topic
